document.full_text: jpmorgan chase & co is in advanced talks with u.s. regulators to resolve a probe into its role in selling subprime mortgage-backed bonds in 2007, a case that highlights a rare misstep by chief executive jamie dimon.
document.title: jpmorgan in talks with sec to resolve probe
lines_and_colors: jpmorgan chase & co is in advanced talks with u.s. regulators to resolve a probe into its role in selling subprime mortgage-backed bonds in 2007, a case that highlights a rare misstep by chief executive jamie dimon.
